Only 2 Characters Of Minor Age Have Appeared Within The Series So Far.

THERE ARE A FEW REAL-LIFE CELEBRITIES WHO HAVE APPEARED AS THEMSELVES WITHIN THE ‘GTA’ SERIES TO DATE. FIRSTLY, LEGENDARY MUSICIAN PHIL COLLINS APPEARED IN ‘GTA: VICE CITY STORIES’ AND YOU EVEN HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO EXPERIENCE AN IN-GAME PERFORMANCE OF ‘IN THE AIR TONIGHT’. SECONDLY, LAZLOW JONES, A CHAT SHOW HOST WAS A VOICE CHARACTER UNTIL ‘GTA V’, WHERE HE APPEARS IN SEVERAL MISSIONS INVOLVING MICHAEL’S DAUGHTER TRACEY.
